system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 4.1
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
text: This is the final release of this version of the Firefox Browser for Android. This version will no longer receive security updates or bug fixes. A brand new Firefox is coming soon to Android devices 5.0 and higher. Prepare to upgrade in the coming weeks.
title: Firefox for Android 68.11.0 Release
